title: Lvl 6 TOKENS?
body:
OK so basically when i got tahm kench lvl 5 i got an lvl 6 token and i got one jsut now btu when i look in my inventory it says i have 1
 SAME FOR MF I GOT A LVL 5 AND AN S lvl 6 TOKEN AND IN INVENTORY IT SAYS I DONT HAVE ONE
 FIX THIS

replies.body:
If you reached mastery level 5 with a champion, you won't be earning a level 6 token for that match. It's not possible to go from level 4 to 5 mastery while *also* earning a token. The message you receive when you hit level 5 is meant to let you know that you can *now* start earning tokens, it was not meant to mean you *did * just earn a token.

Hope this helped. Let me know if you have any other questions.
